SEARCH
Package de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices

Klasse EventControllerService

java.lang.Object
de.flyndre.fleventsbackend.controllerServices.EventControllerService
@Service public class EventControllerService extends Object
This Class is the service for the EventController class. It provides methods regarding accounts. The methods of the EventController are mapped on them.

    • getEvents

      public List<Event> getEvents()
      Returns a list of all existing events.
      Gibt zurück:
      list of all events

    • getEventById

      public Event getEventById(String eventId)
      Returns the event with the given id.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event
      Gibt zurück:
      event with the given id

    • getEventPreview

      public EventPreview getEventPreview(String eventId, String token) throws InvalidAttributesException
      Returns the EventPreview of the specified organization if the given token is valid.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to get the preview from
      token - the token to validate the request
      Gibt zurück:
      the EventPreview with the data of the event
      Löst aus:
      InvalidAttributesException

    • deleteEvent

      public void deleteEvent(String eventId)
      Delets the event with the given id.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to delete

      Returns a list of all attendees from the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to get the list of attendees from
      Gibt zurück:
      list with the accounts of the attendees of the event

    • getOrganizers

      public List<FleventsAccount> getOrganizers(String eventId)
      Returns a list of all organizers from the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to get the list of organizers from
      Gibt zurück:
      list of accounts with the organizers of the event

    • createEvent

      public Event createEvent(Event event, String accountId, String organizationId)
      Parameter:
      event - the event to be created
      accountId - the id of the account which is registered as organizer
      organizationId - the id of the organization in which to create the event
      Gibt zurück:
      the created event object

    • setEventById

      public Event setEventById(String eventId, Event event)
      Overwrites the event specified with a given id with the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to be set
      event - the event to be set to the given id
      Gibt zurück:
      updated event

    • inviteToEvent

      public void inviteToEvent(String eventId, String email, EventRole role) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Sends an invitation email to the given email with a link to register with the specified role to the specified event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to send an invitation to
      email - the email to send the invitation link to
      role - the role which gets assigned to the invited person
      Löst aus:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException

    • acceptInvitation

      public void acceptInvitation(String eventId, String accountId, String token) throws InvalidAttributesException
      Adds the specified account to the specified event. The account will have the specified role.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to add the account to
      accountId - the id of the account to be added
      token - the token in the invitation link to verify the invitation
      Löst aus:
      InvalidAttributesException

    • validateAndDeleteToken

      public void validateAndDeleteToken(String token, String eventId) throws InvalidAttributesException
      invalidates the given InvitationToken
      Parameter:
      token - the InvitationToken to a specific event
      eventId - the EventUuid to the Event
      Löst aus:
      InvalidAttributesException

    • changeRole

      public void changeRole(String eventId, String accountId, EventRole fromRole, EventRole toRole)
      Changes the role of a specified account in an event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event with the account
      accountId - the id of the account which role has to be changed
      fromRole - the role of the account before the change
      toRole - the role to change the account to

    • addAnonymousAccountToEvent

      public void addAnonymousAccountToEvent(String eventId, FleventsAccount account)
      Adds an anonymous account to an event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to add the anonymous account to
      account - the anonymous account to be added

    • registerAnonymousAccountToEvent

      public void registerAnonymousAccountToEvent(String eventId, String mailAddress)
      Registers an anonymous Account to an Event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to add the anonymous account to
      mailAddress - the mail adr ess to be added

    • removeAccountFromEvent

      public void removeAccountFromEvent(String eventId, String accountId, EventRole role)
      Removes a specified account from the specified event. The account needs to have the specified role.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to remove the account from
      accountId - the id of the account to be removed from the event
      role - the role of the account

    • sendAutomaticEmails

      @Scheduled(cron="1 0 * * * *") public void sendAutomaticEmails()
      Run every hour and checks if some scheduled mails have to be sent. Triggers the email sending for each event, if the time in the email config is at the same time as the system. Ignoring the values of minute, second and nanosecond. Makes not sure that the emails were sent when something happens while sending them.

    • getGranted

      public boolean getGranted(org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth, String uuid, List<Role> roles)
      Validate if the given Authentication matches to the given roles for the given event id.
      Parameter:
      auth - the Authentication to validate.
      uuid - the id of the event in which context the validation should be done.
      roles - the event roles that should match.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the given parameters match, false if not.

    • attendeesCheckIn

      public void attendeesCheckIn(String eventId, String accountId)
      Sets the attendees status to checkedIn.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to check in
      accountId - the id of the account to be checked in

    • attendeesCheckOut

      public void attendeesCheckOut(String eventId, String accountId)
      Sets the attendees status to checkedOut.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the id of the event to check in
      accountId - the id of the account to be checked in

    • getCheckedIn

      public List<String> getCheckedIn(String eventId)
      Gets all checked-In attendees
      Parameter:
      eventId - the if of the event to get the checked-In attendees from
      Gibt zurück:
      a list with all the Uuid of checked-In attendees

    • addAccountToEvent

      public void addAccountToEvent(String eventId, String accountId)
      Ands an account as an attendee to the given event.
      Parameter:
      eventId - the event to add the account
      accountId - the account to be added.
